title: Supply
fullText:
Electrical equipment shall be:
(a) earthed and protected by an RCD with a fixed rated residual current not exceeding 30 mA;
(b) supplied at either extra-low voltage or low voltage through an isolating transformer complying with AS/NZS 61558, and not earthed; or
(c) supplied by other suitable measures that take account of the electrical equipment construction, installation methods, and physical location.
